name: Cash - Reserve
description: Debt service reserve and O&M reserve

name: Accounts Receivable — Energy Sales
description: Receivables from PPA and merchant energy sales

name: Prepaid Land Leases
description: Prepaid land lease and easement payments

name: Projects Under Development
description: Capitalized development costs for pipeline projects

name: Solar Generation Assets
description: Solar PV plants — panels / inverters / racking / BOS

name: Wind Generation Assets
description: Wind turbine generators / towers / foundations / collection

name: Buildings and Improvements
description: O&M buildings / control rooms / warehouses / offices

name: Vehicles and Field Equipment
description: Service trucks / ATVs / drone fleet / test equipment

name: Accumulated Depreciation
description: Contra asset — all fixed asset depreciation

name: Project Finance Debt — Term Loan A
description: Senior secured term loan — solar portfolio

name: Project Finance Debt — Term Loan B
description: Senior secured term loan — wind portfolio

name: Asset Retirement Obligations
description: Estimated decommissioning and site restoration costs

name: Energy Sales — Merchant
description: Revenue from spot market and day-ahead sales

name: Capacity Payments
description: Capacity market and ancillary service revenue

name: Development Fee Revenue
description: Development and management fees from partnerships

name: Land Lease Expense
description: Annual land and easement lease payments

name: Depreciation — Generation Assets
description: Depreciation of solar / wind / BESS assets

name: Interest Expense
description: Interest on project debt and corporate revolver
